description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Location: Lot A3.1, Dong An 2 Industrial Zone Thu Dau Mot City, Binh Duong Province, Vietnam
              
              1.	POSITION & PURPOSE
              
              The incumbent shall play a lead role in the supporting continuous improvements in product design, production techniques and the introduction of new generations of water heaters required for the ever increasing competitive markets.
              
              The primary role of this position is to:
              
              •	Provide 3D CAD product design engineering support to meet Rheem’s manufacturing continuous improvement programs and new market opportunities.
              
              •	To enable efficient transition from part design to tooling and machine method of manufacture.
              
              •	To establish, control and maintain the Rheem Design Control system;
              
              •	To facilitate the compliance to statutory and certification authorities for existing and new product implementation.
              

              2.	NATURE & SCOPE
              
              This position operates within the Research and Development Department of Rheem Vietnam.
              
              The incumbent is required to:
              
              •	Apply engineering knowledge and experience to the production of new designs and modifications to existing designs of water heater and conditioning products in order to meet the inter-company demand for new products, improvements to existing products, quality enhancements and cost reductions;
              
              •	Work in collaboration with all other parts of the organisation in order to implement these new and changed products;
              
              •	Work with external organisations, standards compliance, product certification authorities to facilitate the implementation of new product into the marketplace.
              

              3.	RESPONSIBILITIES & AUTHORITIES
              
              Design Control
              
              The incumbent shall be part of a team controlling materials, components and assemblies manufactured or purchased by the Rheem Vietnam operations, primarily responsible for:
              
              •	Overall control of benchmarking and product design for “new markets”.
              
              •	 Providing product design engineering support in order to reduce manufacturing costs, to increase manufacturing capacity, and to provide product reliability, quality and performance.
              
              •	Develop Concept Plans, preliminary models/drawings for new R&D projects.
              
              •	Provide detailed engineering designs for new products and modifications to existing products.
              
              •	Preparation and maintenance of Design Control Documentation, including
              
              o	Technical Specifications for product and components
              
              o	Drawings
              
              o	Bill of Materials and ERP establishment for new or modified product
              
              o	Failure Mode Effects Analysis, FMEA
              
              o	Design for Manufacture Effects Analysis, DFMEA
              
              o	Manage the CI-PCR Product Change Request register.
              
              •	Analysing, problem solving of 4M Continuous Improvement programs related to product design.
              
              •	Participate in ‘Cost Down’ projects.
              
              •	Providing technical advice and support to other departments/personnel.
              

              Product Specification & Certification
              
              •	Develop product specifications to meet specific market needs as defined by the relevant marketplace.
              
              •	Manage product development projects, including
              
              o	Developing project plans;
              
              o	Ensuring milestones are achieved;
              
              o	Ensuring compliance with product and market specification;
              
              o	Supporting the approvals process for certification compliance of new product;
              
              o	Liasing with department heads regarding the introduction of new products or product modifications to production implementation.

Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              4.	QUALIFICATIONS, EXPERIENCE & SKILLS
              
              •	Ability to fluently communicate, speak and write English.
              
              •	10 years minimum experience in the design of appliances or related manufacturing, mechanical equipment assembly.
              
              •	Manufacturing or Mechanical Engineering Qualification is an advantage
              
              •	Experience in 3D CAD design.
              
              •	Competency in Project Planning
              
              •	Strong planning, organising and interpersonal skills.
              
              •	An ability to manage and complete complex product design projects.
              
              •	An ability to work on multiple projects within tight timeframes.
              
              •	An ability to work and achieve results within a team environment.
